event.title: April of 2006, the deadly H5N1 virus was found

data.event: In April of 2006, the deadly H5N1 virus was found in the remains of a wild Mute Swan in the village of Cellardyke in Fife, Scotland.

event.title: February, poultry producer Bernard Matthews' farm in Suffolk had more than 160,000 birds killed

data.event: In February, poultry producer Bernard Matthews' farm in Suffolk had more than 160,000 birds killed after they were infected with the H5N1 virus.
